titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to clarify that immigrant visas may not be issued to aliens who are infected with the etiologic agent for acquired immune deficiency syndrome.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

bill.summary: 6/3/1987--Introduced. Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to prohibit the admission into the United States of an alien infected with the etiologic agent for acquired immune deficiency syndrome (AIDS).
